title: 17 Stylish Shoes From Amazon That You Need This Summer
description: While we love the experience of shopping for shoes in-store, let's face it: adding them to our virtual cart is just so much more convenient. It saves precious time and, arguably, is a more productive shopping experience, given that we can diligently study up on customer reviews and product details before plugging in our credit card info. Plus, the ease of searching for exactly what we want with just a few clicks beats running around the store any day. At this very moment, we're on the hunt for a great pair (or two) of stylish shoes to wear on repeat this spring and summer. Lucky for us, Amazon is brimming with options that cater to every taste. No matter which shoe trend has caught your eye this season, Amazon's got you covered. From minimalist thong sandals that complement any outfit to trendy mesh and fisherman styles, the retailer has it all and more. Whether you're in need of everyday sneakers, versatile flats, or even designer shoes, Amazon has got you covered with stylish finds for the season ahead. Keep scrolling to discover our top 17 picks, with options at every price point.
author: Marisa Petrarca
excerpt: We rounded up the best stylish summer shoes from Amazon, including a range of minimalist and maximalist styles at all price points.

While each product featured is independently selected by our editors, we may include paid promotion. If you buy something through our links, we may earn commission. Read more about our Product Review Guidelines here.

While we love the experience of shopping for shoes in-store, let's face it: adding them to our virtual cart is just so much more convenient. It saves precious time and, arguably, is a more productive shopping experience, given that we can diligently study up on customer reviews and product details before plugging in our credit card info. Plus, the ease of searching for exactly what we want with just a few clicks beats running around the store any day. At this very moment, we're on the hunt for a great pair (or two) of stylish shoes to wear on repeat this spring and summer. Lucky for us, Amazon is brimming with options that cater to every taste.

No matter which shoe trend has caught your eye this season, Amazon's got you covered. From minimalist thong sandals that complement any outfit to trendy mesh and fisherman styles, the retailer has it all and more. Whether you're in need of everyday sneakers, versatile flats, or even designer shoes, Amazon has got you covered with stylish finds for the season ahead. Keep scrolling to discover our top 17 picks, with options at every price point.

Best Thong Sandals

Amazon Essentials Thong Sandal ($14)

Calling all fashion minimalists: These thong sandals are a must have if you're looking for a pair to complement everything in your wardrobe. They have just the right amount of padding to keep you comfortable, and the thong strap comes in several different colors, along with a few patterned options.

Best Flip Flops

KuaiLu Flip Flops ($14, originally $20)

These flip flops stand out with their stylish knot design, which makes them feel more fashion-forward than your average pair. Amazon shoppers quite literally rave about how comfortable these ones are. "When I say they are the best, I am not exaggerating," wrote one of thousands of reviewers who gave them five stars.

Best Chunky Sandals

Dream Pairs Lug Sole Chunky Sandals ($21, originally $30)

These chunky lug sole sandals bring '90s nostalgia straight to your wardrobe, no vintage store hunting required. Don't be intimidated by the height; these sandals boast squishy-soft soles and sturdy lug soles to keep you comfortably on your feet all day long.

Best Fisherman Sandals

Dream Pairs Fisherman Gladiator Woven Flat Sandals ($26, originally $30)

This summer, consider trading your strappy tan sandals for a pair of trendy fisherman-style sandals. They come in every neutral hue you could ask for, including tan, black, white, and dark brown.

Best Cushy Sandals

Teva Women's Olowahu Sandal ($28, originally $34)

Nearly 20,000 shoppers have given these Teva sandals a perfect five-star rating. Many have worn them for years and are now purchasing a second pair in a different color. Shoppers describe them as "indestructible," comfortable (with many praising their arch support), and stylish.

Best Designer Dupe

Rihero Dressy Flats ($29, originally $34)

While some high-end designer sandals like these will set you back well over $500, this faux leather dupe is a much more affordable alternative at below $30. The neutral brown hue featured here is a versatile choice, but they also come in green, white, and black.

Best Mesh Sandals

Feversole Pointed Toe Casual Slingback Flat Mules ($35)

Finding mesh sandals on Amazon can be tricky, especially with many options from luxury labels at steep prices. But fear not, as you can snag this stylish pair for under $35. As one satisfied customer raved, "They're classy looking and go with just about everything."

Best Slingback

Chinese Laundry Women's Mango Pump ($70)

What's not to love about these pumps? They have no shortage of fabulous details, from their pretty pink floral print and delicate lace detail to their sturdy block heel and slingback silhouette. FYI: They're sold out on the brand's website, but you can still get them on Amazon (for now, anyway).

Best Buckled Flats

Steve Madden Women's Graya Flat ($70)

These red hot buckled flats will easily transition from season to season, so you don't have to worry about them being a one season wonder. "I wear them all the time and get compliments whenever I wear them," writes one of many reviewers to give them a five-star rating. "People always stop to ask where I got them. They are also super comfortable! I love them so much I got them in black, white, and denim as well."

Best Kitten Heel

JW PEI Women's Sara Mule Heeled Sandals ($71, originally $89)

You've definitely heard of JW PEI bags, but it's time the brand's shoes are on your radar, too. As far as we're concerned, it doesn't get much more stylish than this puffy pair, featuring a pointed toe and kitten heel, all crafted in vegan leather. They come in a rainbow of colors, so you can choose which best suits your style.

Best Lace-Up Sandals

Tkees Women's Jo Lace Up Sandals ($95)

These lace-up sandals offer a high quality design and versatility. They have a toe loop and straps that stylishly wrap around your foot and ankle, with just the right amount of cushioning. On Amazon, they're available in three colors (black, gold, and tan), but they're selling quickly, so don't miss out.

Best Sneakers

Veja Volley Sneakers ($99, originally $145)

Prefer sneakers to sandals? This popular Veja pair will go with everything in your wardrobe. They're super comfortable, and shoppers note that you can dress them up or down, whether you're sporting shorts, a maxi dress, or anything in between.

Best Pointed Flats

C.Paravano Women's Flats ($121)

These statement-making pointed flats look at least triple the price. Crafted from tweed and featuring a lambskin insole with a comfortable padded footbed, they're as luxurious as they are chic. Whether you wear them to the office or to happy hour, you can expect all eyes on you.

Best Platform Sneakers

Dolce Vita Women's Notice Sneaker ($139)

Hurry to scoop up these pink platform sneakers while they're still available. "I saw a women in the airport with these sneakers and had to have them," one reviewer wrote. "I absolutely love these shoes!! So comfortable and true to size!" PS: they come in 28 colorways.

Best Crocheted Shoes

Staud Simone Crochet Heels ($395)

These heels are a great choice if you're okay with a summer splurge. They beautifully complement a variety of summer outfits, especially sundresses. They're nearly sold out on the brand's website, but if you move quickly, you can still scoop them up in multiple sizes via Amazon.
